scripts.title: Ask for a Small Discount
scripts.template: Hi! I love this product. Are there any promotions or discounts available today? I'm ready to buy if so.
exampleOutcomes: They might throw in a freebie
Worst case: polite 'no' and you still buy
scripts.tips: Smile and be friendly. Most retail staff have some discount authority.

scripts.title: Request a Meeting with Your Manager
scripts.template: Hi [Manager], I'd love to schedule 15 minutes to discuss my recent work and get your feedback on how I can grow in my role. Would you have time this week?
exampleOutcomes: Show initiative and interest in growth
Build a stronger relationship with your manager
scripts.tips: Come prepared with specific questions or topics to discuss.

scripts.title: Ask for a Referral
scripts.template: Hi [Name], I really enjoyed working with you on [project]. I'm currently looking for opportunities in [field]. Would you be comfortable referring me or connecting me with anyone in your network?
exampleOutcomes: Get a warm introduction to new opportunities
scripts.tips: Make it easy for them by being specific about what you're looking for.

scripts.title: Negotiate Your Salary
scripts.template: Thank you for the offer. I'm very excited about this opportunity. Based on my research and experience, I was hoping for a salary in the range of [X-Y]. Is there flexibility to discuss this?
exampleOutcomes: Sets the tone for future negotiations
scripts.tips: Research market rates beforehand. Have specific accomplishments ready to justify your ask.

scripts.title: Ask Someone to Coffee
scripts.template: Hey [Name], I've really enjoyed our conversations about [topic]. Would you want to grab coffee sometime? I'd love to continue the discussion.
exampleOutcomes: Make a new friend or connection
scripts.tips: Be genuine and specific about why you want to connect.

scripts.title: Request a Deadline Extension
scripts.template: Hi [Name], I wanted to give you an update on [project]. I've encountered [specific challenge] and want to ensure I deliver quality work. Would it be possible to extend the deadline by [time]?
exampleOutcomes: Get more time to deliver quality work
scripts.tips: Ask early, explain the reason, and propose a specific new deadline.

scripts.title: Request Better Service at a Restaurant
scripts.template: Excuse me, I ordered about [time] ago and haven't received my food yet. Could you check on the status? I appreciate your help.
exampleOutcomes: Might receive a discount or free item
Practice standing up for yourself politely
scripts.tips: Be polite but direct. Staff usually appreciate knowing there's an issue.

scripts.title: Ask for Feedback on Your Work
scripts.template: Hi [Name], I'd really value your perspective on [project/work]. Do you have 10 minutes to share some feedback? I'm looking to improve.
exampleOutcomes: Show that you value others' opinions
scripts.tips: Be specific about what aspect you want feedback on.

tasks.title: Send One Message
tasks.description: Send one Slack or email message asking for 5 minutes of someone's time for help or advice.

tasks.title: 10-Minute Walk
tasks.description: Book a 10-minute walk in your calendar right now and commit to taking it today.

tasks.title: Clear One Item
tasks.description: Pick one small task from your to-do list that you've been avoiding and do it now.

tasks.title: Compliment Someone
tasks.description: Give a genuine compliment to someone today. Notice something specific and positive.

tasks.title: Ask for Help
tasks.description: Identify one thing you're stuck on and ask someone for help. It could be a colleague, friend, or even an online community.

tasks.title: Try a New Route
tasks.description: Take a different path to somewhere you go regularly. Notice what's different.

tasks.title: Write Three Gratitudes
tasks.description: Write down three things you're grateful for today. Be specific about why.

tasks.title: Make One Phone Call
tasks.description: Call someone you haven't talked to in a while. Even a 2-minute catch-up counts.

rituals.title: Morning Playlist
rituals.description: Start your day with 5 minutes of your favorite upbeat music while you prepare.
steps: Open your music app
Pick 2-3 songs that make you feel good
Let the music play while you get ready
Dance or move if you feel like it!

rituals.title: Mindful Coffee
rituals.description: Transform your coffee break into a mini meditation moment.
steps: Make your favorite hot drink
Sit somewhere comfortable
Notice the warmth of the cup
Take slow sips and savor each one
Appreciate this moment of peace

rituals.title: Sunshine Break
rituals.description: Step outside for a brief moment of natural light and fresh air.
steps: Step outside or open a window
Look up at the sky
Take 5 deep breaths
Notice something beautiful around you
Feel grateful for this moment

rituals.title: Gratitude Note
rituals.description: Write a quick thank you message to someone who made your day better.
steps: Think of someone who helped you today
Write a quick message thanking them
Send it via text, email, or say it in person
Notice how it makes you feel

rituals.title: Photo Walk
rituals.description: Take a short walk and capture one beautiful thing with your phone camera.
steps: Go for a 5-minute walk
Look for something beautiful or interesting
Take a photo of it
Appreciate the beauty in everyday things

rituals.title: Evening Wind-Down
rituals.description: A simple routine to transition from work mode to rest mode.
steps: Light a candle or dim the lights
Put away your phone for 10 minutes
Stretch your body gently
Think of one good thing from today
Take 5 slow, deep breaths

rituals.title: Mini Plant Check
rituals.description: Spend a moment caring for a plant or appreciating nature.
steps: Find a plant or go near some greenery
Look at it closely - notice the details
Water it if it needs it
Say something kind to it (really!)

rituals.title: One Page Read
rituals.description: Read just one page of a book you enjoy - no pressure for more.
steps: Pick up a book you enjoy
Read just one page
Really absorb what you read
Put it down with no guilt

rituals.title: Music Discovery
rituals.description: Listen to one new song you've never heard before.
steps: Open your music app's 'Discover' or 'New Releases'
Pick a song that catches your eye
Listen to it fully without multitasking
Decide if you want to save it

rituals.title: Star Moment
rituals.description: Acknowledge one thing you did well today, no matter how small.
steps: Think about your day
Find one thing you handled well
Say to yourself: 'I did that well'
Smile and feel proud

actions.title: Make Your Bed
actions.description: Start your day with a small win. Making your bed sets the tone for a productive day.
tips: Do it right after waking up
Keep it simple - just straighten the covers
This creates momentum for bigger tasks

actions.title: Drink a Glass of Water
actions.description: Hydrate your body first thing in the morning to boost energy and focus.
tips: Keep a glass by your bedside
Room temperature water is easier to drink
Add lemon for extra freshness

actions.title: Write 3 Priorities
actions.description: Identify your top 3 priorities for today. Focus beats multitasking.
tips: Choose tasks that move the needle
Be specific about what done looks like
Put the hardest task first

actions.title: Send One Thank You Message
actions.description: Express gratitude to someone who helped you recently. Small acts strengthen relationships.
tips: Be specific about what you appreciate
Text, email, or voice message all work
Genuine beats perfect

actions.title: Take a 5-Minute Walk
actions.description: Step away from your desk and move. Brief walks boost creativity and reduce stress.
tips: Leave your phone behind
Notice 3 things around you
Breathe deeply as you walk

actions.title: Clear Your Desk
actions.description: Spend 5 minutes organizing your workspace. A clear desk leads to a clear mind.
tips: Put away items you are not using today
Throw away or recycle clutter
Wipe down surfaces for a fresh feel

actions.title: Complete One Dreaded Task
actions.description: Pick that task you have been avoiding and do it now. Relief awaits on the other side.
tips: Start with just 2 minutes - momentum builds
Reward yourself after completing it
Remember: done is better than perfect

actions.title: Do 10 Pushups
actions.description: Quick physical exercise to boost energy and build strength over time.
tips: Modify on knees if needed
Focus on form over speed
Breathe out as you push up

actions.title: Read for 10 Minutes
actions.description: Pick up that book you have been meaning to read. Small reading sessions add up.
tips: Keep your book visible and accessible
Read before reaching for your phone
Fiction or non-fiction both count

actions.title: Unsubscribe from 3 Emails
actions.description: Reduce digital clutter by unsubscribing from newsletters you never read.
tips: Check your promotions/spam folder
Be ruthless - you can always resubscribe
This saves time every day

actions.title: Plan Tomorrow Tonight
actions.description: Spend 5 minutes planning tomorrow before bed. Wake up with clarity and purpose.
tips: Review what you accomplished today
Set 1-3 priorities for tomorrow
Lay out clothes or prep items you need

actions.title: Practice Deep Breathing
actions.description: 5 deep breaths to calm your nervous system and regain focus.
tips: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 6
Close your eyes if comfortable
Do this whenever you feel stressed
